title: Project-Based Learning on Phase Changes of Matter Using Augmented Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic chemistry concepts (atoms, molecules, thermal energy, etc.)
context.additional_context: Offline program utilizing digital devices (tablets/AR devices), emphasizing conceptual application through project-based learning

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and explain phase changes of matter (solid-liquid-gas) in 3D using augmented reality modules.
Learners can design and conduct phase-change experiments linked to everyday life scenarios through project-based learning.
Through formative assessments, learners can explain the scientific principles of state changes (molecular motion, energy changes, etc.) with over 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
